text: Such a framework that is capable of dealing with discourse deixis and bridging relations from a common perspective aims at improving the poor reliability scores obtained by previous annotation schemes , which fail to capture the vague references inherent in both these links .

Jaundice can be treated with phototherapy and more blood transfusions ( NHS Choices 2013b , NICE 2008b ) .These treatments will help your baby 's liver to break down the necessary blood cells ( NICE 2008b ) .Most cases of rhesus disease are mild and respond well to minimal treatments ( NHS Choices 2013b ) .
